title: Rescue the Male Lead - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Josei   Martial Arts   Romance   School Life   Shoujo
tags: Ancient Times   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Depictions of Cruelty   Devoted Love Interests   Different Social Status   Familial Love   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Inferiority Complex   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Mob Protagonist   Multiple POV   Nobles   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   Royalty   S*aves   Stoic Characters   Strong Love Interests   System Administrator   Transmigration   Villainess Noble Girls   World Hopping   Yandere
author: 薛泞
description:
Su Su ended up reading a cultivation novel while expecting a story filled with action, power-ups, and a triumphant protagonist. But why was the male protagonist abused at every turn and even had a miserable end? After posting her angry comments, Su Su was bound by a system and transmigrated into the novel to change the protagonist’s fate.

First World: The Miserable S*ave General 

Second World: A Bullied Student in School

This is a story of how she heals a miserable male lead’s heart.>
